metadata.title: CVE-2024-53205 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phy: realtek: usb: fix NULL deref in rtk_usb2phy_probeIn rtk_usb2phy_probe() devm_kzalloc() may return NULLbut this returned value is not checked.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53205` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic-64k - 6.8.0-11.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-aws - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-azure - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1002-gcp - 6.8.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-7-lowlatency - 6.8.0-7.7.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-7-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-7.7.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-oracle - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
